capabilities.name: generate_video
capabilities.description: Creates a video project using the json2video API. Each project can contain multiple scenes, and each scene can contain various elements such as text, images, video, audio, components, HTML, voice, audiogram, and subtitles. See https://json2video.com/docs/api/ for full schema.

capabilities.name: get_video_status
capabilities.description: Get the status or result of a generated video

capabilities.name: create_template
capabilities.description: Create a new template in json2video

capabilities.name: list_templates
capabilities.description: List all available templates from json2video
